title: [Large-Scale] Dynamic Instructional Design Course for Improving Programming Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental programming concepts and experience writing simple code
context.additional_context: Large-scale language domain programming education conducted in a limited technological environment focused on smartphones

learning_goals: Explain at least three programming design patterns applicable to various problem-solving scenarios
Learners can apply optimal algorithm selection strategies at each problem-solving stage with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze problems occurring in real work environments and document step-by-step problem-solving procedures.

resources: Offline workbook and code example repository
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
